summary_text: Overall ROAS is healthy, but recent ROAS has been decreasing. There are also some underperforming creatives that should be paused or updated.

insights.title: Recent ROAS Decline
insights.description: ROAS has declined in the last week, from 2025-03-24 to 2025-03-31. This could be due to increased competition, changes in audience behavior, or ineffective creatives and requires investigation.

insights.title: Underperforming Creative: Women Sports Bras (Microfiber)
insights.description: The creative "Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras." has a very low ROAS of 1.90, significantly underperforming compared to other creatives. Pausing this creative or updating the copy/visuals is recommended.

creative_issues.creative_message: Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.

insights.title: Underperforming Creative: Men Athletic Briefs (Modal)
insights.description: The creative "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men athletic briefs." has a low ROAS of 1.95. Evaluate the targeting and ad copy for this creative.

creative_issues.creative_message: Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men athletic briefs.

insights.title: Top Performing Creative: Men Boxers (Modal)
insights.description: The creative "Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers." demonstrates high ROAS of 50.91 and CTR of 0.014. Consider increasing spend on this creative and exploring similar creatives.

creative_issues.creative_message: Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers.

insights.title: Creative Fatigue Detected
insights.description: Multiple creatives have high impressions and declining ROAS, indicating creative fatigue. Refresh ad copy and visuals for creatives with high impressions but ROAS below 10.

insights.title: Retargeting Audience Outperforming
insights.description: The retargeting audience has a significantly higher ROAS (14.40) compared to Broad (8.06) and Lookalike (9.66) audiences. Focus more spend on retargeting efforts.

insights.title: Platform Performance Comparison
insights.description: Facebook has slightly higher ROAS (9.90) than Instagram (9.38), though both perform well. Monitor platform performance closely and adjust spend accordingly.
